Description: Fragment of marble monumental Greek inscription; parts of front and back surfaces preserved; broken away on all sides.
Curator's comments: Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 191. Names, Thallio (?), Lyson.
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1085)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXI, no. 6)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 42, pl. 41,4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.15)
